Without functioning devices, these systems would fail, leading to widespread power outages, water shortages, and transportation disruptions. This would have a devastating impact on public health, safety, and well-being. (Confidence score: 0.9)

Without access to information, communication, and entertainment, people would become restless and agitated. Riots, looting, and civil unrest would become more likely as people seek to cope with the sudden loss of their digital lives. (Confidence score: 0.8)
